title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: The Prado
hours: Lunch M-F 11:30AM-3PM, Sa Sun 11AM-3PM. Dinner Tu-Su from 5PM onward
content: Just about the only full-service restaurant in Balboa Park (save for a couple of places in the zoo), The Prado has a diverse menu with appetizers, salads, soups, seafood, pastas, and sandwiches.
